channel.title: Hey and help!
channel.description: hey guys im new and like ive started to like rs private servers but i dont know squat for example im using the morparscape client to make a new server it comes up with this ip alredy in 120.0.01 i think it is then when i go to change the ip name it changes but then next time i log out it say it must be offline or somthing ?wtf? and i need help on how to code stuff like shops the client comes with a list of stuff to spawn but i dont know how to other than ::pickup and ::pnpc ::pnc thats all i know of and i need help cause im realy looking forward to making my own server help will be muchly appreciated ty guys :)

item.title: Hey and help!
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

@Fay:telling him to try harder aint working so stop spamming please this is a [u]warning.not to be mean or anything but that doesnt help at all.

@momo man:

to edit the character files
1.right click and press edit then a window showing the username and pass(sometimes encrypted with md5[unchangable and unreadable]).
2.then change the rights to what ever you want them to be
Here is the rights codes
0=Player
1=mod
2=admin
3=owner
4=hidden owner
3.so to change ones rights to owner it would be

character-rights= 3

see as i only put the number.

[u]Help
the = and after dont add just tells what each does.

Read full topic

item.title: Hey and help!
item.dc:creator: @momo_man momo man
item.description:
@momo_man wrote:

ty for the help imsokool22
i appreciate it also how to i mod char files?
i want to make my self the owners and like make some people staff
ty for all your help oh and to make it easy for me can some one private message me on tutorials for my server and some new sources like imsocool22 said plz?
ty all u guys are great
im new to this stuff so srry if im annoying you but i dont know squat lol but im learning…

Read full topic

item.title: Hey and help!
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

[quote=“momo man, post:1, topic:327144”]hey guys im new and like ive started to like rs private servers but i dont know squat for example
im using the morparscape client to make a new server it comes up with this ip alredy in 120.0.01 i think it is
then when i go to change the ip name it changes but then next time i log out it say it must be offline or somthing ?wtf?
and i need help on how to code stuff like shops the client comes with a list of stuff to spawn but i dont know how to other than ::pickup and ::pnpc ::pnc thats all i know of and i need help cause im realy looking forward to making my own server help will be muchly appreciated ty guys :)[/quote]
ok to tell you.
1.You have to use localhost ip which is 127.0.0.1 , 0.0.0.0, localhost
(only use one of those three)
2.hybridscape you cant edit so i recommend chosing a source from the download section then using it with moparscape client
3.Main commands are as follows:

[quote]
::mute playername
to mute a player change playername to that player’s name EX. to mute me(just an example) type ::mute imsokool22
::ban playername
bans the player you use as player name
EX. ::ban imsokool22
::ipban*
ip bans the player-means that they cant login from that acc on any other ip
::ipmute*
mutes them even if they use a different ip
[u]Index
*Refer to mute and ban to see how it works but instead put a ::ip instead of ::command(replace with command name)

Help
*=refer to index at the bottom for help

Read full topic
